check.name: AttributeAccuracyReportPresent
check.description: Checks to see if at least one Attribute Accuracy Report concept exists.
check.code:
def call(): global output global status
output = "The concept AttributeAccuracyReport is present."
if(AttributeAccuracyReport is not None and len(str(AttributeAccuracyReport)) > 0): status = "SUCCESS" return True
status = "FAILURE" output = "AttributeAccuracyReport concept is not present"
return False
